Interface ec.tables.AssocFunc

public interface AssocFunc
Called with associations from some kind of collection of associations, like Tables.

Usually to be implemented by an inner class -- use lightly (avoid class bloat).

See Also:
each

run(Object, Object)
Repeatedly called with successive key-value pairs from some collection.
